# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a collection of weights for a single blend shape.

## Declaration

```swift
init<S>(_ weights: S) where S : Sequence, S.Element == Float
```

## Parameters

- **weights**: An array of float weights for the blend shape.
title: init(_:)
